title: What is the most complex technology ever crafted? - Quora

response.answer_text: Society itself. Or maybe I should say a city. We don’t think about a city being a technology because cities have been around for a very long time and have been constantly changing and adapting. The various different systems come together to not only keep people alive but also allows us to share resources and specialize labor. Instead of all of us being able to maintain a water supply, a building, a food source, and transportation, we created the city so that we could defer to others who can concentrate on their area of expertise.
